Title: Relates to the creation of a research program to determine the risks posed from chemicals in personal care products or menstrual products
Summary: Relates to the creation of a research program to determine the risks posed from chemicals in personal care products or menstrual products.
LawCode: Add ยง804, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the creation of a research program to determine the risks posed from chemicals in personal care products or menstrual products; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
